scripts.distribution:darwin: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource defaults.yaml --extra-resource dist/about.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --extra-resource dist/dock.asar --overwrite --platform darwin --icon src/img/desktop.icns --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © Reactive Markets" --app-category-type public.app-category.business --app-bundle-id com.reactivemarkets.desktop --protocol desktop --protocol-name "Desktop Protocol" --darwin-dark-mode-support --out pack
scripts.distribution:linux: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource defaults.yaml --extra-resource dist/about.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --extra-resource dist/dock.asar --overwrite --platform linux --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © Reactive Markets" --out pack
scripts.distribution:win32: electron-packager dist --prebuilt-asar dist/app.asar --extra-resource defaults.yaml --extra-resource dist/about.asar --extra-resource dist/api.asar --extra-resource dist/dock.asar --overwrite --platform win32 --icon src/img/desktop.ico --arch x64 --app-copyright="Copyright © Reactive Markets" --out pack
scripts.package: run-s clean copy distribution installer zip
scripts.package:darwin: run-s clean copy distribution:darwin installer:dmg zip:darwin
scripts.package:linux: run-s clean copy distribution:linux installer:debian zip:linux
scripts.package:win32: run-s clean copy distribution:win32 installer:windows zip:win32
scripts.installer:debian: cross-var electron-installer-debian --src pack/Desktop-linux-x64/ --dest pack/ --arch amd64 --options.version $npm_package_version --config debian.json
scripts.installer:dmg: cross-var electron-installer-dmg pack/Desktop-darwin-x64/Desktop.app desktop-$npm_package_version --overwrite --title Desktop --background src/img/dmg-background.png --icon src/img/desktop.icns --out pack
